title: CyberArk EPM Set & Account Admin Activities
description: This dashboard highlights Set and Account Administrator activities, showing key events, trends, and source activity to support oversight and investigation of privileged actions.

definition.content:
This dashboard highlights Set and Account Administrator activities, showing key events, trends, and source activity to support oversight and investigation of privileged actions.

For more information, see the [CyberArk Endpoint Privilege Manager Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/cyberark_endpoint_privilege_manager/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

This group provides visibility into Set Administrator audit activity within CyberArk EPM. It helps monitor administrative actions, track event patterns over time, most active administrators, and analyze source IP distribution for security and compliance oversight.

This group provides visibility into Account Administrator activity, highlighting event trends, top accounts and admins, source IP patterns, and detailed audit logs to support monitoring and investigation of administrative changes.
